title: Content Type
description: TYPO3 CMS Content Blocks Field Type Text

allowLanguageSynchronization.description: Allows to select if localization uses custom or default language value

cols.description: Abstract value for the width of the field

default.description: Default value set if a new record is created.

enableRichtext.description: Enables richtext editing for the field.

enableTabulator.description: Enabling this allows to use tabs in a text field

fixedFont.description: Enables a fixed-width font (monospace) for the text field

is_in.description: Evaluates whether the text contains this value

nullable.description: Allows database null values for the field

readOnly.description: Renders the field in a way that the user can see the value but cannot edit it.

required.description: If set, the field becomes mandatory.

richtextConfiguration.description: Configuration for the richtext editor, if enabled.

rows.description: Number of rows for the textarea field

searchable.description: Enables search functionality for the field

softref.description: Used to attach soft reference parsers
